values.description: A long, catlike tail, forking into two near its base. It flicks back and forth whenever [PAWN_nameDef] is displeased with something.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: nekomata eye
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: Slitted, yellow eyes are now [PAWN_nameDef]'s to keep. They are keener and rather enticing to look at.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: nekomata
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s hands have reshaped to become like paws, complete with retractable claws. This gives [PAWN_objective] a combat advantage. Thankfully, this more manipulative paw allows [PAWN_nameDef] to keep [PAWN_possessive] thumbs.

li.description: Whatever mutations the mechanites in [PAWN_nameDef]'s blood were trying to invoke have gone horribly awry, leaving [PAWN_possessive] hands weak and inflexible.

li.label: long nails
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s fingernails are growing at an alarming rate.

li.label: clawed
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s fingernails have become long, curved and pointed, like that of a feline.

li.label: padded
li.description: Fleshy pads have appeared on [PAWN_nameDef]'s palm and fingers, giving the clawed hand a more catlike appearance. Thankfully [PAWN_objective] thumb is still functional.

li.label: contorted
li.description: The first joint of each of [PAWN_nameDef]'s fingers have shortend and reversed directions. The joint unfurls when [PAWN_pronoun] unclenches [PAWN_possessive] hands, bringing [PAWN_possessive] new claws to bear.

li.label: unfamiliar
li.description: The mechanites have finished their work on [PAWN_nameDef]'s new cat-like paws, yet they still remain foreign and unfamiliar to [PAWN_objective] and will take some to get used to.

li.label: adapted
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s hands have reshaped to become like paws, complete with retractable claws. This gives [PAWN_objective] a combat advantage. Thankfully, this more manipulative paw allows [PAWN_nameDef] to keep [PAWN_possessive] thumbs.

li.label: paragon
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s hands have become quite catlike, granting [PAWN_objective] both vicious claws to rend [PAWN_possessive] foes with and suprising grace and dexterity when working on mundane tasks.
